price: Ìṣẹ̀mí ayé kò jẹ́ kiní kan bí kò ṣe eré àti ìranù. Ọgbà Ìkẹ́yìn sì lóore jùlọ fún àwọn tó ń bẹ̀rù (Allāhu). Ṣé ẹ ò ṣe làákàyè ni?
arabic: وَمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ إِلَّا لَعِبٞ وَلَهۡوٞۖ وَلَلدَّارُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ لِّلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā illā laʿibun walahwun walalddāru al-ākhiratu khayrun lilladhīna yattaqūna afalā taʿqilūna
